Class LoginActivity.UserLoginTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>

  • Enclosing class:
    LoginActivity

    public class LoginActivity.UserLoginTask
extends <any>
    Represents an asynchronous login/registration task used to authenticate the user.
